= Tor & Privaxy =

== Install Tor: ==
Open the terminal and type:
```
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install tor
```
== Configure Tor: ==
Edit the Tor configuration file:

```
sudo nano /etc/tor/torrc
```
Add the following lines:
```
yaml

ControlPort 9051
CookieAuthentication 1
```
== Restart Tor: ==
```
sudo service tor restart
```
Install Privoxy:
```
sudo apt-get install privoxy
```
== Configure Privoxy: ==
Edit the Privoxy configuration file:

```
sudo nano /etc/privoxy/config
```
Add this line to forward traffic to Tor:
```
forward-socks5 / 127.0.0.1:9050 .
```
Restart Privoxy:
```
sudo service privoxy restart
```
== Test your setup: ==
Configure your browser to use Privoxy as a proxy on localhost:8118. Visit check.torproject.org to verify your connection.

See also: Tor Project Documentation Privoxy User Manual
